questions.quote: I'm... I'm just... I'm the worst person ever. How can I not tell David that I'm seeing Mike?
Joey and my friend were out last night and having dinner and she reaches over and takes a few of his fries...
Oh, ju-ju-just stay calm. Just be calm. For all he knows we're just hanging out together. Right? Just be nonchalant. That's not nonchalant!
Why?! You two are so meant to be together, everybody thinks so.
Yeah Joey she's...Rachel's got this really big work problem, and it is a head scratcher. Wow! Y'know what, if we're gonna make dinner we're gonna have to leave. Yeah.
Ok, there is no top. That's the beauty of Smelly Cat. Um, why don't you just follow me?
Wow! Have you ever rescued anyone from a burning building before?
Hey! I need you to set me up for a joke. Later, when Monica is around, I need you to ask me about fire trucks.
I'm sorry it's just, Phoebe just always thought you were, you were charming in a, in a sexless kind of way.
Well, then it wouldn't be a secret. So yeah, that would be okay. Yeah. Yeah!
